## ğŸŒ English Version {#english-version}

# Japanese Creative Writing Plugin for Claude Code

A Claude Code plugin providing specialized agents and skills for writing Japanese ghost stories (kaidan), novels, and various creative texts.

## Overview

This plugin provides three specialized agents for creative writing in Japanese:

### ğŸ® Kaidan Writer Agent

- Specialized in traditional Japanese ghost stories and horror fiction
- Supports multiple types: realistic style, urban legends, vengeful spirits, supernatural phenomena
- Uses advanced horror storytelling techniques

### ğŸ“š Novel Writer Agent

- Supports multiple genres: romance, mystery, fantasy, SF, coming-of-age, historical fiction
- Character development, plot creation, and progressive writing support
- Flexible length from short stories to full-length novels

### âœï¸ Creative Writer Agent

- Supports essays, poetry, plays, children's stories, travel writing, reviews
- Multiple writing styles available
- Complete creative support from ideation to revision

## Installation

### Local Development/Testing

```bash
# Add marketplace
/plugin marketplace add /home/naoki/work/claude-kaidan-plugin

# Install plugin
/plugin install japanese-creative-writing@japanese-creative-writing-marketplace
```

### From GitHub (After Publishing)

```bash
# Add marketplace
/plugin marketplace add username/japanese-creative-writing

# Install plugin
/plugin install japanese-creative-writing@japanese-creative-writing-marketplace
```

## Quick Start

After installation, simply request creative writing in Japanese:

```
Write a ghost story set in an abandoned school
```

```
Write a short romance novel set in modern Tokyo
```

```
Write an essay about autumn in Kyoto
```

## Features

- ğŸ¤– **3 Specialized Agents**: Automatically activated based on your request
- ğŸ“ **Auto-loaded Skills**: Each agent comes with specialized writing guidelines
- ğŸ¨ **Multiple Genres**: Horror, romance, mystery, fantasy, SF, essays, poetry, and more
- ğŸ”„ **Revision Support**: Flexible revision based on your feedback
- ğŸ“¦ **Easy Installation**: One command to install and start using

## Documentation

For detailed documentation in Japanese, see above.
